languages.text: "Первый ткач среди ткачей. Тот, кто плетет паутину веры впятеро дольше, чем я живу. Кровь от крови флагмана. Мой наставник и учитель".
"He is the first among us. The Vizsier has spun the web of faith for fivefold longer than I have lived. Blood of the flagship's blood. My mentor and teacher."
languages.original_text: "Первый ткач среди ткачей. Тот, кто плетет паутину веры впятеро дольше, чем я живу. Кровь от крови флагмана. Мой наставник и учитель".

traits.locale_text: "The first among the weavers. One who has spun the web of faith for fivefold as long as I have lived. Blood of the flagship's blood. My teacher and mentor."
"The first among the weavers. One who has spun the web of faith for fivefold as long as I have lived. Blood of the flagship's blood. My teacher and mentor."
"He is the First Weaver. The Vizsier has spun the web of faith for fivefold longer than I have lived. Blood of the flagship's blood. My mentor and teacher."
"He is the First Weaver. The Vizsier has spun the web of faith for fivefold longer than I have lived. Blood of the flagship's blood. My mentor and teacher."
"He is the first among us. The Vizsier has spun the web of faith for fivefold longer than I have lived. Blood of the flagship's blood. My mentor and teacher."
"He is the first among us. The Vizsier has spun the web of faith for fivefold longer than I have lived. Blood of the flagship's blood. My mentor and teacher."

languages.text: « C'est le premier d'entre nous. Le vizir tisse la toile de la foi depuis cinq fois le temps que j'ai vécu. Il est le sang à l'origine du sang de ce vaisseau. Mon mentor et mon maître. »
languages.original_text: "He is the first among us. The Vizsier has spun the web of faith for fivefold longer than I have lived. Blood of the flagship's blood. My mentor and teacher."

traits.locale_text: « C'est le premier d'entre nous. Le vizir tisse la toile de la foi depuis cinq fois le temps que j'ai vécu. Il est le sang à l'origine du sang de ce vaisseau. Mon mentor et mon maître. »

languages.text: «Es el primero entre nosotros. El Visir ha tejido la red de la fe durante cinco veces más del tiempo que he vivido. Sangre de la sangre de la nave insignia. Mi mentor y maestro».
languages.original_text: "He is the first among us. The Vizsier has spun the web of faith for fivefold longer than I have lived. Blood of the flagship's blood. My mentor and teacher."

traits.locale_text: «Es el primero entre nosotros. El Visir ha tejido la red de la fe durante cinco veces más del tiempo que he vivido. Sangre de la sangre de la nave insignia. Mi mentor y maestro».

languages.text: “宿老是我们的首席织网者，他编织信仰之网的时间是我寿命的五倍之久。他是旗舰的血脉之血，也是我的授业者，我的导师。”
languages.original_text: "He is the first among us. The Vizsier has spun the web of faith for fivefold longer than I have lived. Blood of the flagship's blood. My mentor and teacher."

traits.locale_text: “宿老是我们的首席织网者，他编织信仰之网的时间是我寿命的五倍之久。他是旗舰的血脉之血，也是我的授业者，我的导师。”

languages.text: 「彼は私たちの中で最初の者だ。ヴィジールは、私が生きてきた5倍もの長い間、信仰の網を紡いできた。旗手の血を引く。私の師匠であり、教師だ」
languages.original_text: "He is the first among us. The Vizsier has spun the web of faith for fivefold longer than I have lived. Blood of the flagship's blood. My mentor and teacher."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は私たちの中で最初の者だ。ヴィジールは、私が生きてきた5倍もの長い間、信仰の網を紡いできた。旗手の血を引く。私の師匠であり、教師だ」

languages.text: "Er ist der Erste unter uns. Der Wesir webt das Netz des Glaubens schon fünfmal länger als ich lebe. Er ist das Blut des Flaggschiffs. Mein Mentor und Lehrer."
languages.original_text: "He is the first among us. The Vizsier has spun the web of faith for fivefold longer than I have lived. Blood of the flagship's blood. My mentor and teacher."

traits.locale_text: "Er ist der Erste unter uns. Der Wesir hat webt das Netz des Glaubens schon fünfmal länger als ich lebe. Er ist das Blut des Flaggschiffs. Mein Mentor und Lehrer."

languages.text: "En önde gelenimizdir. Vezir, yaşadığım ömrüm beş misli boyunca inanç ağı örmüştür. Sancak gemisinin kanıdır. Yönderim ve öğretmenimdir."
languages.original_text: "He is the first among us. The Vizsier has spun the web of faith for fivefold longer than I have lived. Blood of the flagship's blood. My mentor and teacher."
